content: The Enslaved Yaksha's Spirit Power allows you to take his form and stab your enemy with the long spike he wields. This deals initial impact damage while also staggering the enemy so you can land another combo before they get up. The equipped effect allows you build Focus when you take damage, so getting hit doesn't sting quite so bad.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Enslaved_Yaksha_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Enslaved Yaksha Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Enslaved Yaksha Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
The Enslaved Yaksha's Spirit Power allows you to take his form and stab your enemy with the long spike he wields. This deals initial impact damage while also staggering the enemy so you can land another combo before they get up. The equipped effect allows you build Focus when you take damage, so getting hit doesn't sting quite so bad.
